casebody.data:
Hemuben PATEL, Personal Representative of the Estate of Harishkumar Patel, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
REINALT-THOMAS CORPORATION, Doing Business As Discount Tire Company, Defendant,
and
Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158795
COA: 337851 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 1, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing its reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before March 10, 2019.
